defaultPage.name: Customize Page Name
defaultPage.hint: The default page name is [Noted Messages].

configuration.name: Journal Configuration
configuration.label: Journal Configuration
configuration.hint: Select the journal for messages to be written to.

info.onlyEditableShown: Only journals and pages you have the ability to edit are displayed.
info.pageBehavior: If the selected page is deleted or renamed, a new page with the same name will be created.

notif.journalNotFound: Unable to find [{journalName}]. It might have been renamed or deleted.
notif.noJournalSet: A journal has not been selected in your configuration.
notif.pageMissing: Unable to find [{pageName}] in [{journalName}], creating a new page with that name.
notif.noPageSelected: Creating a new page called [{defaultPageName}] in [{journalName}].

permissionError.page: You have lost the ability to edit [{pageName}] in [{journalName}]. No message can be written.
permissionError.journal: You have lost the ability to edit [{journalName}]. No message can be written.
